name: Happiness
description: Ask your employees how happy they are.

NAME.description: Name of the application, used on the homepage and in the mails.

PROTOCOL.description: Protocol to be used for the app: http or https.

POSTMASTER.description: Email address that will send the mails.

NUMBER_OF_RANDOM_QUESTIONS_PER_SURVEY.description: How many random questions are asked in each survey?

SEND_SURVEY_AT_DAYS.description: Comma separated list of the days a survey should be sent (1 is Monday).

MAILER_USER_NAME.description: User name for the SMTP server.

MAILER_ADDRESS.description: Address for the SMTP server (not the email address).

MAILER_AUTHENTICATION.description: Authentiation mechanism for the SMTP server (login or cram_md5).
